title: Rule Breaker Books 1 & 2
description: When music exec, Jon Lansing agrees to give Orion a shot during Nashville’s battle of the bands, he isn’t prepared for the wrecking ball force of vocalist, Alana St. James. From the audience, Jon watches Alana struts her stuff on stage, captivated by the charismatic power of this rising star. Their first meeting has enough friction to cause sparks! Sure, they butt heads, yet secretly each fights a red-hot attraction. Ever since Jon's girlfriend was murdered, he doesn't cross the line. Until he finds in Alana a sweet vulnerability beneath a sassy exterior.And one night isn’t enough.This fiery affair ignites between these two lovers, breaking all sorts of rules. But can Alana and Jon risk their careers for an affair that threatens to crash and burn without survivors?
author: Susan Arden
